caption.p: Representation of the training process of each CNN: (A) LeNet, (B) AlexNet and (C) GoogLeNet (orange line: accuracy validation; green line: loss validation; blue line: loss training). A–LeNet (after 200 epochs): percent accuracy (validation) 57.50%, loss (validation) 2.07, loss (training) 0.03; B–AlexNet (after 200 epochs): percent accuracy (validation) 74.69%, loss (validation) 0.83, loss (training) 0.11; C–GoogLeNet (after 200 epochs): percent accuracy (validation) 83.88%, loss (validation) 1.03, loss (training) 0.00.
